Author: brett
Title: Anyone have thoughts on the viability of a firefox os?
Content:
It's not a new idea. Why not roll a linux distro that boots directly into firefox and then start hacking ff to add on any missing os functionality and ensure the entire experience is smooth? There are plenty of people that don't use much more than their web browser and with Google Docs that number is only going to grow.

Anyone know of someone already working on this?
